title: No-Code Node
description: A powerful visual MongoDB schema designer and API generator. Build your backend without writing code using an intuitive interface and TypeScript support.
features: Visual Schema Design: Design your MongoDB schemas visually with an intuitive drag-and-drop interface.
Auto-Generated APIs: Get fully functional CRUD APIs automatically generated from your schema design.
TypeScript Support: Generate type-safe MongoDB models with TypeScript interfaces and validations.

title: Last Take
description: Last Take is an exciting online multiplayer survival game where players face off in a round-table environment, using strategy, manipulation, and luck to survive and outlast their opponents.
features: Multiplayer Gameplay: Play with multiple players in real-time, connected via Socket.io for seamless game interactions.
3D Environment: Experience an immersive 3D environment built with Three.js, enhancing the overall visual experience.
Survival Mechanics: Players are seated around a table where a gun is passed around, containing both live and fake bullets, and players must rely on luck and strategy to survive the longest.
Abilities: Players have access to various abilities and equipment that can be used to deceive, manipulate, or eliminate opponents.
Luck Factor: With random outcomes influenced by the presence of both live and fake bullets, luck plays a critical role in determining who survives.
Voice Chat: Communicate with other players in real-time using the integrated Peer.js voice chat feature, enabling strategic communication and deception.

title: UI Component Library
description: A fully typed, themeable, and performant React component library designed for building responsive and composable user interfaces with dark mode support.
features: TypeScript Ready: Fully typed components for better developer experience and fewer bugs.
Themeable: Customize colors and styles through a centralized theme context.
Performant: Optimized for performance with minimal bundle size and efficient rendering.
Composable: Build complex UIs by combining simple, reusable components.
Responsive: Looks great on any device with responsive design principles.
Dark Mode: Built-in support for light and dark modes with smooth transitions.
